How to play?:
1. Play promotion game by using GPI Live Coins (min. 1) 
2. Each promotion GPI Live Coins allow player to play one round of promotion game. 
3. Play in promotion game will be rewarded with prizes. 
4. Win and claim promotion prizes.
How to earn GPI Live Coins?:
1. Play for real on participating games under Gameplay Interactive (GPI). 
2. GPI Live Coins will be rewarded randomly during promotion period. 
3. Check on remaining prizes left during promotion period. 
4. Only player that is actively play on participating games will be able to earn GPI Live coins. 
5. The more GPI Live Coins earn, more chance to win promotion prizes.
How to win prizes in promotional game?:
1. Follow game instruction on each promotional game. 
2. To claim winning prize as specified on promotion. 
3. GPI Live Coins that obtained that is not used within the promotion period shall be void and no further use. 
4. Any Prizes that is not claimed within promotion period as specified will become void or no further use.
